      getAllItems is definition to get all items method
      double totalPriceforItems(int quantity, long itemId)
      totalPriceforItems is definition to calculate the total price for n quantities of the same item The logic of this function is very simple i assumed that the same product may have many offers for example if i bought 7 pieces of iphone7 which price is 1000$ and it had a two offers 1800 for 2 pieces and 3000$ for 4 pieces so the total prices after discounting both offers 1800(2)+3000(4)+1000(1) = 5800$

      • totalPriceforItems

        public double totalPriceforItems(int quantity,
                                 long itemId)
        totalPriceforItems is definition to calculate the total price for n quantities of the same item The logic of this function is very simple i assumed that the same product may have many offers for example if i bought 7 pieces of iphone7 which price is 1000$ and it had a two offers 1800 for 2 pieces and 3000$ for 4 pieces so the total prices after discounting both offers 1800(2)+3000(4)+1000(1) = 5800$
        Specified by:
        totalPriceforItems in interface ItemService
        Parameters:
        integer - the ordered pieces of the item
        integer - of the item id
        Returns:
        the total of price after the distcount
